attr.title: Gravity Storm - First Mission
attr.desc: Break the laws of physics, dash and shoot your way through levels full of hazards and machines gone rogue. In this retro game, you control Project Gravity Storm, an advanced machine able to control gravity itself; however, the mother computer will not make things easy for you.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Itch.io or Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the demo version.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Itch.io](https://jampley-dev.itch.io/gravity-storm-first-mission) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3482870/Gravity_Storm__First_Mission/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the demo version.
